round 6 to outline the little hearts make sure you move beyond the lfptrs as you switch from stitching behind round 6 to in front and back again you will have to push lfptr aside to find the stitches the starting stitch is the marked double_crochet pull the marker to the front to get in the right position to start with yarn a working in front of round 6 2 double_crochet in st working behind round 6 2 double_crochet in next st skip slip_stitch working behind round 6 2 double_crochet in next st working in front of round 6 2 double_crochet in next st skip slip_stitch x 5 slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to join do not finish off 40 double_crochet pull the little hearts out with your fingers to make sure they are sitting nicely on the surface serpent star copyright lettice rose 2024 this completes the central body motif the next round will form each leg of the starfish in turn there are two versions one features bullions and will produce the most lifelike result the second is an alternative for those who dislike making them you will find the two versions legs curve differently and the bullion version needs more careful tacking down to the background both have their charms
